title: Press the attack bug (UI issue or actually broken)
body: after recently testing the new ruins it comes to my attention that a keystone (press the attack) either is not proccing or the ui is bugged and its not showing up, but i cannot tell if its not showing up but it defiantly feels like im not doing extra damage and by the end of the game the tool tip says ive not done any extra damage, can any1 else confirm.
